root.name: dot()

example.code: v = PVector(10, 20, 0) d = v.dot(60, 80, 0) println(d) # Prints "2200.0"
v1 = PVector(10, 20, 0) v2 = PVector(60, 80, 0) d = v1.dot(v2) println(d) # Prints "2200.0"

root.description: Calculates the dot product of two vectors.

parameter.label: v
parameter.description: PVector: any variable of type PVector

parameter.label: x
parameter.description: float: x component of the vector

parameter.label: y
parameter.description: float: y component of the vector

parameter.label: z
parameter.description: float: z component of the vector

parameter.label: v1
parameter.description: PVector: any variable of type PVector

parameter.label: v2
parameter.description: PVector: any variable of type PVector
